New static site generator
/post/2019-05-06-new-static-site-generator/ 2019-05-06T00:00:00+0000 2019-05-06T00:00:00+0000 I’ve switched my static site generator from Pelican to Hugo. I’ve tried to ensure that all the old links continue to work correctly, but if you notice anything missing or otherwise not working as intended, please let me know by opening an issue. Thanks!
Administrivia: Pelican and theme update
/post/2018-01-26-administrivia/ 2018-01-26T00:00:00+0000 2018-01-26T00:00:00+0000 I’ve just refreshed the version of Pelican used to generate this blog, along with the associated themes and plugins. It all seems to be working, but if you spot a problem feel free to drop me a line.
